title: Trigger happy Harry
creator_credit: Business Films and John B. Sandstone
brief_description: Through the experiences of a careless and ignorant hunter, the safe and proper ways of handling a gun are taught. The National Rifle Association’s pointers for safety are covered: point the muzzle in a safe direction; is that gun loaded?; be sure of your target before you shoot; be sure of your backstop; know your gun and ammunition.
